missionDescriptions.missionDescription: Humanity has just exited Earth searching for a new home. Help them settle with a small space base, and learn how to gather resources and survive the harsh outer space.

After a few years, your colony has been completely established, but new problems appeared. Space exploration has brought space pirates with it, and they have targeted your base. Prepare some defenses and protect your people!

Your final challenge has arrived. Defeating those pirates was not enough, and now they have prepared a base nearby. We need to keep our people save in the cold space, and we MUST do what is necessary to survive, at any cost...
